The code ensures the camera stays at least one foot above the terrain or two feet above Ralph, whichever is higher. It uses collision detection with `camGroundHandler` to determine the terrain height and adjusts the camera's Z-coordinate accordingly. Additionally, it positions a "floater" above Ralph's head to help maintain a stable camera angle as Ralph moves through the environment.
